snippet: BLAUFARB--Leon Solomon. Baruch atta Adonai melech haolam dayan emet. Our dad passed away January 13th with his family around him. Storyteller, attorney, bartender, reader, fisher, athlete, a master of The Times Crossword. The best parts of him continue on in the best parts of his sons. Memorial service Monday, January 18, 2016, 11am, Park Slope Jewish Center, 1320 8th Ave, Brooklyn. 1/3
